#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n,u;
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&u);
    int rt=sqrt(n);
    vector<int> arr(n+1);
    vector<vector<int> > mem(rt,vector<int> (n+1));
    while(u--)
    {
        int a,b;
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        if(a>=rt)
        {
            for(int i=b;i<=n;i+=a)
                arr[i]++;
        }
        else
            mem[a][b]++;
    }

    for(int i = 1; i < rt; i++)
    {
        for(int j = 0; j < i; j++)
        {
            int c = 0;
            for (int k = j; k <= n; k += i)
            {
                c += mem[i][k];
                arr[k] += c;
            }
		 }
	}
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
		     cout << arr[i] << " ";
    return 0;
}
